ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Just wondering...
ygData.msgSnippet: LOL I like the do not help list... I guess I just check my ignore list for that. :o) I keep a player journal at eq.castersrealm.com and specifically name
ygData.messageBody:
LOL I like the "do not help" list... I guess I just check my ignore list for that. :o)
 
I keep a player journal at eq.castersrealm.com and specifically name people who help me... and there are many. )
 
Akane
-----Original Message-----
From: LeSamLam@... [mailto:LeSamLam@...]
Sent: Wednesday, March 14, 2001 1:20 PM
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Just wondering...

I'm a newbie.  I'm up to level 9 with my enchanter.  I have a little
list...yes I actuallly write down the names LOL...of the people who have
really helped me and when I'm at a high level and am able, I will repay all
those nice favors.  And when I can, I help the newer than me newbies.  Oh and
I also have a don't help list...there's 2 names on there....

Lena


I'm on Bertoxx......
Anyway....It's a good thing to help newbie's when you see one.  Helped a
newbie by explaining the /loc command and showing him around Kelethin.
turns out that that made his level 40 brother very happy...now he wants to
make me happy (hopefully NOT in that way)

so...the moral of the story is:

Help newbies....you just might be helping them help you in the long run.


Sarakan the helpful
